text: Alcyone is a blue giant star. Also called Eta Tauri, it is the brightest star in the Pleiades star cluster. It is over 400 light years awayhttps://arxiv.org/abs/1408.6544 yet over 2,000 times brighter than the Sun.https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2000ASPC..214...13H ==References== Category:Stars
title: Alcyone (star)
